description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Tomato Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Tomato Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve tomatoes. Place in a sieve over a bowl, season with salt and pepper and leave to drain for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Join pastry, pressing to seal. Fold edges in to form a 1.5cm border. Scatter 1/2 cup cheese over pastry. Discard tomato juice, pat dry tomatoes and layer over cheese with prosciutto slices. Drizzle with a little balsamic vinegar. Top with another 1/2 cup of the cheese.
Bake for 25 minutes until puffed and golden. Garnish with basil leaves.
